# CpuidLeafContent Equality operator

Implements the == operator.

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(CpuidLeafContent right, CpuidLeafContent left)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| right | The right leaf info. |
| left | The left leaf info. |

## Return Value

Returns `true` if right is equal to left; otherwise `false`.
